query:
UPDATE projects
               SET name = $2
               WHERE id = $1
               RETURNING id as "id!: Uuid",
                         name,
                         default_agent_working_dir,
                         remote_project_id as "remote_project_id: Uuid",
                         created_at as "created_at!: DateTime<Utc>",
                         updated_at as "updated_at!: DateTime<Utc>"
